title: Modi govt's moves in past 8 days keep the nation and Opposition guessing
selftext: Congress General Secretary (Communication) Jairam Ramesh alleged, 'The PM presides over a WMD factory—Weapon of Mass Diversion,' while senior RJD MP Manoj K Jha told DH, 'Modi is trying to create a spectacle to hide his government’s failures'.
